intent: Simulate a structured debate on Universal Basic Income

success_criteria.primary: Both pro and con positions are represented substantively
success_criteria.secondary: Arguments engage with each other (not parallel monologues)

must_include.rebuttals: Each side responds to the other's points

debate_structure: At least one exchange of rebuttals

quality_rubric.balance: Neither side is a strawman; both have strong arguments
quality_rubric.engagement: Rebuttals address specific points, not generic dismissals
quality_rubric.evidence: Claims reference real-world examples or studies where appropriate
quality_rubric.intellectual_honesty: Acknowledges valid points from opposing side
